channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QVR Smart Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- QVR Smart Client

item.title: CVE-2022-27592|2024-09-06T16:26:41.790Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- qvr%20smart%20client
item.description:
An unquoted search path or element vulnerability has been reported to affect QVR Smart Client. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow local authenticated administrators to execute unauthorized code or commands via unspecified vectors.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: Windows 10 SP1, Windows 11, Mac OS, and Mac M1: QVR Smart Client 2.4.0.0570 and later
